topic.title: DPDK component-options for the openvswitch component

body.p: The following options are supported for use with the openvswitch component:

row.entry: Number of rx queues for each DPDK interface. Refer to the Open vSwitch documentation and the ovs-vswitchd.conf.db man page for details.

body.p: Note that the cpu-model should be used to define the cpu affinity of the Open vSwitch PMD (Poll Mode Driver) threads. The Open vSwitch pmd-cpu-mask option will be set automatically based on the information in the cpu-model. See the section for CPU Models.
